archimate:Requirement.name: NC.1.5.4: Firewall configuration should incorporate security architecture principles (e.g. 'secure by design', 'defence in depth', 'secure by default', 'default deny', 'fail secure', 'secure in deployment' and 'usability and manageability').
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
